data.message:
I feel really bad for this but I need to start this movement 

#giveashitornitlegit

I'm starting a movement to fight drug addiction the premise is that I don't care that you sell drug I don't give a shit about that I actually love coccaine by you know what I like more then that people I care about my community and have been getting publicly shamed for it several times now and I'm just getting super fed up with my towns nonsense perhaps posting these words elsewhere will make more of a difference it's not about the fact that you do drugs it's the fact that you don't care about who get hurt in the process and that I just can't have any longer I 
#giveashit
